definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: An ice bag or hot water bottle applied to the back many also help to ease the pain.
sentences.chinese: 許多也幫助鎮痛的冰袋或熱水袋適用於後面。

sentences.english: The attention to recovery reminds me of what footballers do with ice baths and masseurs .
sentences.chinese: 關注它們的康復也讓我想到了球員們的冰袋和按摩師。

sentences.english: He ran to the kitchen and got the ice pack out of the freezer, laid it against her eye.
sentences.chinese: 他跑到廚房從冰箱裏拿出冰袋，敷到她的眼睛上。

sentences.english: Wrap the injured area with a bandage to prevent inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 用冰袋將傷處包裹起來，以防止發炎。

sentences.english: Comes with food containers, a drink bottle, and an ice pack to keep your food fresh all day.
sentences.chinese: 包含保鮮盒，飲料品及用來保持食物全天新鮮的冰袋。

sentences.english: Packs of ice were put on my forehead to keep down the fever.
sentences.chinese: 冰袋放在額頭上用來降溫。

sentences.english: Remember that it's easy to get dehydrated so stock up with lots of sodas in the ice-box.
sentences.chinese: 記住，冰袋裏裝多些蘇打水，人很容易脫水的。

sentences.english: If you can't tolerate an ice bath, use ice packs on sore areas.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不能忍受冰浴，在痠痛處敷上冰袋。

sentences.english: She was going to work with ice packs on her back.
sentences.chinese: 她經常用冰袋放在背上以緩解病痛。

sentences.english: If you can't tolerate an ice bath, use ice packs on sore joints.
sentences.chinese: 假若你忍受不了冰塊浴，可以使用冰袋敷在疼痛部位。

sentences.english: When you bring your lunch to school, use an ice pack to keep the food cold.
sentences.chinese: 當你帶你的午餐到學校，使用冰袋來保持食物冷度。

sentences.english: The problem with ice packs is they won't conform to the shape of the injured body part.
sentences.chinese: 冰袋有個缺點就是不會隨着傷處的形狀變化而變化。
